n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
total_sum = sum(a)

s = set()
for i in range(n):
	if total_sum - a[i] == a[i]:
		s.add(i+1)

print(len(s))
print(*s)

s = set()

		s.add(i+1)

print(len(s))
print(*s)

import sys

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

total_sum = sum(a)

s = set()
for i in range(n):
	if total_sum - a[i] == a[i]:
		s.add(i+1)

print(len(s))
print(*s, sep = " ", end = "", file = sys.stdout)

# SOLUTION
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# check if the array is good
if sum(a) - max(a) == max(a):
    print(1)
    print(a.index(max(a))+1)
else:
    print(0)

# SOLUTION
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# check if the array is good
if sum(a) - max(a) == max(a):
    print(1)
    print(a.index(max(a))+1)
else:
    print(0)
#!/usr/bin/env python3


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    total_sum = sum(a)

    s = set()
    for i in range(n):
        if total_sum - a[i] == a[i]:
            s.add(i+1)

    print(len(s))
    print(*s)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

        print(i+1, end=" ")
